page.title: 07Local Education
page.content: {Llangennech}has two schools, one junior and one infant school. Although the main language of the schools is Welsh, both contain Welsh and English streams, and cater for 280 children between 3 and 11 years. {Hendy}has one school originally built in 1880. It caters for around 170 children and the main language of the school is English. There are four schools in {Pontarddulais.}One is a new comprehensive school built in 1982. The other three schools are the English primary school the Welsh junior school(Ysgol Bryn Iago), and an Adjustment Unit. There are 360 children of between 3 and 11 years in the English primary school and 120 children of between 3 and 11 years in the Welsh primary school.
